description: Size of Doehlert-Klee design with n blocks.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. G. Stanton and S. A. Vanstone, Further results on a problem of Doehlert and Klee, Utilitas Math., 12 (1977), 263-271.
links: D. H. Doehlert, V. L. Klee, Experimental designs through level reduction of the d-dimensional cuboctahedron, Discrete Math. 2 (1972), no. 4, 309-334.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
